CustomField.description: Identifies applicable root cause for case closures triggered as a result of receiving this event message. Applicable only when IsCaseClosureEligible__c = true.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies applicable root cause for case closures triggered as a result of receiving this event message. Applicable only when IsCaseClosureEligible__c = true.
CustomField.label: Case Automation Root Cause
